Hello, this is Amit Tomar.

I am a masters student at IIIT Bangalore , India. I worked at Embedded Innovation Labs, Tata Consultancy Services for around two and half years. My work included design and development of UI and middleware frameworks for high end In-Vehicle Infotainment systems.

At IIITB I am part of Graphic-Visualization-Computing Lab , working with Prof. Jaya Sreevalsan-Nair . My work involves modelling and visualizations for small world networks.

My intersts include - Computer Graphics, UI/UX design and development, Information and Scientific Visualization, Operating Systems, Automotive Infotainments, Middleware components.
